title: [Large-Scale] Simulation-Based Training Course for Practical GIS Application

context.prior_knowledge: Basic geographical concepts and computer operation skills
context.additional_context: Modular design for enhancing GIS problem-solving skills with a focus on practical application

learning_goals: Learners can solve real-world work environment problems using GIS-based spatial analysis tools with 80% accuracy.
Learners can execute complex GIS tasks in three or fewer steps using a step-by-step simulation interface.
Learners can upload and share GIS project outputs on a collaborative platform in mobile environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
